name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unroll a Bluesky Thread with Skyview

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a tab using Skyview to Unroll a Bluesky Thread

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right-click menu option to generate a shareable unroll of a Bluesky thread using Skyview's handy tool

Skyview's Unroll:  Only shows the top post and replies by the same author. Great for viewing long form content consisting of multiple chained posts.

Just passes the URL of the Bluesky post to Skyview for unroll.  No other data is used.

https://skyview.social/
